TopicTitle: Vessels problem + some options don't work.

Articles.Content:
Hello,

Recently, I wanted to try vessels mods from the steam and KSP forum, every mod I installed had locked or invalid parts. I of course read readme and installed required mods, but still, it does not work.  Any fix for that? Next problem - not working options + problem with entering some facilities. After installing mods, I can enter only astronaut complex, when I click on other buildings nothing happens. Also "leave facility" and "Quit to the main menu" options don't work.

MOD LIST - https://imgur.com/a/mQkgB6n

First of all, why is CKAN.exe inside your GameData folder? Only KSP files should be inside the KSP folders or Bad Things can happen; put CKAN somewhere else, like your desktop.

Secondly, you have two Module Managers which can also cause Bad Things to happen- you should never have more than one, so keep the newest version and delete the other.

For an issue like this, log files are very useful- here’s how to get them:

https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/83212-how-to-get-support-read-first/
